Music Production Technologist

Combining technical expertise with creative audio production and sound design.

I merge technical precision with creative expression, producing music that resonates emotionally while leveraging cutting-edge technology. From beat creation to mastering, I craft sonic experiences that tell stories.

What I Bring
What I Bring

I merge technical expertise with creative vision to produce professional-quality music and multimedia experiences. With formal training in music production and 15+ years of hands-on experience, I understand both the artistic and technical aspects of sound design, from beat creation to mastering, from live events to digital distribution.

Evidence
Evidence

From Education at Glokala Folkshögskola

"Immersed in an in-depth Music Production program, acquiring proficiency in recording, mixing, mastering, event planning, and industry-standard practices. Produced and released multiple songs, primarily in hip-hop and R&B genres. Organized and hosted an event for Malmö-based artists at Arena 305."

Source: Portfolio Experience - Glokala Folkshögskola (2009)

From Blog: Music Production Tools 2022

"My journey in music production has been defined by experimentation and learning industry-standard tools. From Reason Studios to Cubase, each DAW has shaped my approach to creating beats, designing sounds, and bringing musical ideas to life."

Source: Blog - Music Production Tools 2022

From Life Timeline

"Released my first official track 'The Demo' – marking the beginning of my music production journey. A milestone that combined technical skills with creative expression."

Source: Life Timeline - 2010

Music Production Process
Music Production Process
🎵

1. Ideation & Composition

Start with musical ideas, create melodies, and build chord progressions using MIDI programming and sampling

🎛️

2. Production & Mixing

Layer instruments, design custom sounds, apply effects, and balance levels for professional sound quality

🎧

3. Mastering & Release

Final polish with mastering techniques, prepare for distribution across platforms like SoundCloud and Spotify
